title: Making shiny objects illuminating: the promise and challenges of large language models in US health systems

abstract: The rapid advancement of generative artificial intelligence (AI), especially large language models (LLMs) in recent years, has transformed the AI industry across society and in particular for the academic biomedical and health communities. Many …
